name: D&Dice Sneaker
description:
This project was made by my 11-year old son in five hours.

One day, Tyler and his friends played D&D (Dungeons and Dragons). Tyler was obsessed with the D20 Die that came with the game. So much so that Tyler wanted to use the die in every board game. Three days later his friends wanted to play Monopoly. Tyler wants to use the D20 die, but his friends don't want him to. You're Tyler and you try to play a D20 die in Monopoly while your friends are distracted. If you're caught, game over.

Made in Scratch
Packaged with Turbowarp
Graphics by issac (creator)
Sounds from kenney.nl
